summary: After the death of her father, an 8-year-old girl becomes convinced that he is whispering to her through the leaves of the gargantuan tree that towers over her house.
cast: Charlotte Gainsbourg|Morgan Davies|Marton Csokas|Christian Byers|Tom Russell|Gabriel Gotting|Aden Young|Penne Hackforth-Jones|Gillian Jones|Zoe Boe|Bob MacKay|Ryan Potter|Murray Shoring|Taren Stewart|Robert Joseph Stewart|Wencis Burns|Margaret Foote|Betty Cartmill|Patrick Boe|Arthur Dignam|Wendy Playfair|Jackie Kelleher|Benita Collings|Emma Pollock|Darius Pollock|Lukas Trotta|Maya Trotta|Noam Trotta|Alice Attal|Olive Jones-Evans|Ivy Jones-Evans|Penn Jones-Evans|Emile Daeron|Jean Gardiner-Cox|Clara Gardiner-Cox
